humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastases in one out of 13 assessed lymph nodes (as per 'C' and 'D' in the report). According to the new rule 12, N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has 13 lymph nodes examined, with 1 lymph node involved (metastatic carcinoma in one lymph node with two foci of metastatic tumor, the larger measuring 0.4 cm). This corresponds to a pathologic N stage of N1.
